Id Title descriptaion
{{ i.id }} {{i.title}} {{ i.description }}
import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { GetdataService } from '../getdata.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { [x: string]: any; data: any; userdata:any; id:any; constructor(private service: GetdataService, private router: Router) { } ngOnInit() { this.service.getUserData().subscribe((data) => { this.data = data; }); this.service.getDataById(this.id).subscribe((userdata) => { this.userdata = userdata; }); } }
